details: The scholarship scheme provides scholarships to students from Scheduled Castes / Scheduled Tribes / Other Backward Class / Minorities and also to the Students with Disability. The scholarships are provided to pursue Home Nursing courses from institutions recognized by the State/Central Government.
benefits: Course Fees: ₹ 3,500/- or Actual Whichever is Less for Certificate Courses of Duration of at Least Six Months
Course Fees: ₹ 5,000/-or Actual Whichever is Less for Diploma Courses of Duration of One Year or More
Course Fees: ₹ 10,000/- or Actual Whichever is Less for Degree in Nursing of Duration of Three Years
Course Fees: ₹ 3,500/- or Actual Whichever is Less for Health Worker Course of Duration of One Year or More
Maintenance Allowance: ₹500/- per month for Scheduled Caste Students (Day Scholars), ₹800/- per month for Scheduled Caste Students (Hostellers)
Maintenance Allowance: ₹300/- per month for Other Students (Day Scholars), ₹600/- per month for Other Students (Hostellers)
Additional One-Time Amount: ₹ 1,000/- for Certificate Courses, ₹ 2,000/- for Diploma Courses, ₹ 3,000/- for Degree Courses
eligibility: The applicant should be a Student.
The applicant should have either been born in Goa or should have resided in Goa for continuously at least 15 years.
The applicant should have secured admission to an institution recognized by the State/Central Government.

The applicant should be pursuing one of the following courses: Certificate Course in Home of Duration of at Least Six Months, Diploma in Home Nursing of Duration of One Year or More, Degree in Nursing of Duration of Three Years, Health Worker Course of Duration of One Year or More.
The annual income of the parent or guardian of the applicant (from all sources) shall not exceed ₹1,50,000/-.
The applicant should be from a Scheduled Caste / Scheduled Tribe / Other Backward Class / Minority or be differently-abled.
application_process: Online application through the Chief Minister Scholarship Portal, Government of Goa.
Registration on the portal and filling of the application form.
Uploading of required documents in the specified format and size.
Submission of the application form and tracking of the application status.
documents_required: Certificates, Diploma, Degree etc in Respect of All Examinations Passed
Income Certificate, issued by Competent Authority
15 Years Domicile Certificate or Residence Certificate
Receipt of Fees Paid to the Institution
